stimulusHtml: The portrait of Sin Sukju, created in the fifteenth century, reflects the impact of Confucianism on Korean artistic traditions
choicesHtml: with its focus on compassion, self-awareness, and enlightenment
with its emphasis on the Way and yin and yang, the balance of opposites
with its focus on connecting to powerful spirits in the natural world
with its emphasis on duty, loyalty, respect, and ancestor worship
